title: Blouse, 19th–20th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk and metal-wrapped thread
Technique: embroidered
creditline: Gift of International Business Machines Corp.
description: Short, full blouse of fine cream linen gathered to a stand-up neckband. Long, full sleeves are gathered at the wrist with a ruffle. Embroidery in red silk cross-stitch and gold thread wound on a linen core, and gold paillettes. Pattern of wide stripes radiating from the neck down the sleeves, with geometric inner decoration.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blouse, 19th–20th century.
19th–20th century. Medium: linen, silk and metal-wrapped thread
